coverage_details.optical_frame: Frame Limit--SR1,500.00 as part of Optical
coverage_details.organ_transplant: Heart, liver, and kidney only, excluding organ cost, up to annual limit
coverage_details.congenital: Covered - Up to Annual Limit (life-threatening congenital diseases specifically covered)
coverage_details.optical: SR 1,500.00, frames and lenses covered up to optical limit, no age limit
coverage_details.screening: Covered - Up to Annual Limit (screening for early and exploratory exam included)
coverage_details.approval_preauthorization_notes: Per-approval required for VIP: 1,500 SR. No pre-approval for outpatient & inpatient, except for services with specific limits (e.g. dental, hearing aids, optical, psychiatric, kidney dialysis, maternity, circumcision, ear piercing, optical treatments, and others with limit).
coverage_details.special_instructions: Medical checkups covered for pre-employment, epidural anesthesia included, knee replacement covered, coverage for mental diseases up to 50,000 SR, seasonal vaccinations included, allergy medicine/tests covered if needed, artificial limbs & prosthesis covered, vitamin tests covered if justified, road accidents as per CHI, complications of a covered treatment included, transportation of mortal remains to home country up to 15,000 SR, rehabilitation, congenital, chronic, neonatal, physiotherapy covered from day 1, all medical equipment/supplies as prescribed covered, medical prescriptions of herbal origin if SFDA approved, sleep apnea devices covered, claims accepted within 180 days; emergency treatment abroad covered up to 50,000 SR, excess at KSA-equivalent provider cost; non-emergency abroad subject to reasonable cost as in KSA (max 180 days abroad); medication limit equal to preauthorization limit.

coverage_details.vaccination: Covered up to Annual Limit (includes Hajj & Flu Vaccinations)
coverage_details.optical_frame: Frame Limit--SR3,000.00 as part of Optical
coverage_details.organ_transplant: Heart, liver, and kidney only, excluding organ cost, up to annual limit
coverage_details.dental_corrective: SR 4,200.00; Deductible: Nil (includes Crown, Pin & Post, Bridge, up to SR 2,500)
coverage_details.congenital: Covered - Up to Annual Limit (life-threatening congenital diseases specifically covered)
coverage_details.optical: SR 3,000.00, frames and lenses covered up to optical limit, no age limit
coverage_details.approval_preauthorization_notes: No pre-approval required for VVIP. Out- and in-patient services covered without prior authorization.
coverage_details.special_instructions: All medical checkups for pre-employment included (for 2,006 employees), coverage for epidural anesthesia, knee replacement, mental diseases up to 50,000 SR, seasonal vaccinations, allergy medicine/tests covered if needed, artificial limbs & prosthesis covered, justified vitamin tests covered, road accidents as per CHI, coverage for treatment-related complications, transportation of mortal remains home up to annual limit (and specifically 15,000 SR in KSA), rehabilitation, congenital, chronic, neonatal, physiotherapy covered from day 1, all prescribed medical equipment and supplies included, herbal-origin medical prescriptions if SFDA approved, sleep apnea devices covered, claims accepted within 180 days; emergency treatment abroad up to 50,000 SR (excess at KSA-equivalent provider cost), non-emergency abroad as reasonable/customary, max 180 days abroad, medication limit equals preauthorization approval amount.

coverage_details.optical_frame: Frame Limit--SR400.00 as part of Optical
coverage_details.organ_transplant: Heart, liver, and kidney only, excluding cost of organ, up to annual limit
coverage_details.optical: SR 400.00, frames and lenses covered up to optical limit, age limit 0-14
coverage_details.approval_preauthorization_notes: Medication limit equals pre-authorization approval limit.
coverage_details.special_instructions: Claims accepted within 180 days; emergency and non-emergency treatment abroad covered as in other classes; equipment and organ coverage follows base policy. Medication coverage and outpatient deductibles as per table.
